name: Kirkata
description:
Find the golden cow of yore!

The ability to discover is in your hands! How you approach the task at hand is dependent on your skills: either build your way forward or dig down and find treasure. The key is in your knowledge and what you learned from the past...

Controls:

Left mouse button - move

Right mouse button - expand/reduce box

Middle mouse button - pickup cow/descend box
